text: @realDonaldTrump I don't know about that, but I do know that you praised Brazilian President (and Trump wannabe) Jair Bolsonaro for his handling of the Coronavirus pandemic! Sound familiar? And now you are going to ban travel from Brazil? What happened? Are you finally coming to your senses? HOPE
